body:
Ever since I joined the site, my votes don't count. I kept forgetting to ask this, and I finally got around to it now.

Whenever I cast a vote, when I reload the page it doesn't count. My vote is still applied, it just doesn't affect the score. If I "unvote" it will also have no effect on the score.

Is this a bug, or is my account flagged as spam somehow?
body_html:
Ever since I joined the site, my votes don't count. I kept forgetting to ask this, and I finally got around to it now.

Whenever I cast a vote, when I reload the page it doesn't count. My vote is still applied, it just doesn't affect the score. If I "unvote" it will also have no effect on the score.

Is this a bug, or is my account flagged as spam somehow?

title: Votes not registering: Am I bugged or shadowbanned?

also I don't post often, check my comments if you want to see activity

body: It should be a bug, I remember kek saying that Ruqqus doesn't shadowban. I'd try logging out and in again, if it still doesn't work, contacting the admins would probably be best.

body: Is this on mobile? I've found a similar issue: one tap and the arrow goes light purple, but a second tap and it actually registers - making the arrow go dark purple.

author.bio: I like big brains and I cannot lie.
author.bio_html: I like big brains and I cannot lie.

body:
Yes. Thereâ€™s a delay showing the updated rep total on comments and posts.

They will show while you are on the same page but seem to disappear if you refresh or revisit the page. The upvote registers but it isnâ€™t reflected in the count shown on the post/comment until the next time the rep is re-calculated on that bit of content.
body_html:
Yes. Thereâ€™s a delay showing the updated rep total on comments and posts.

They will show while you are on the same page but seem to disappear if you refresh or revisit the page. The upvote registers but it isnâ€™t reflected in the count shown on the post/comment until the next time the rep is re-calculated on that bit of content.

parent.body: This is the score on the actual post/comment, not the total rep.
parent.body_html: This is the score on the actual post/comment, not the total rep.

post.body:
Ever since I joined the site, my votes don't count. I kept forgetting to ask this, and I finally got around to it now.

Whenever I cast a vote, when I reload the page it doesn't count. My vote is still applied, it just doesn't affect the score. If I "unvote" it will also have no effect on the score.

Is this a bug, or is my account flagged as spam somehow?
post.body_html:
Ever since I joined the site, my votes don't count. I kept forgetting to ask this, and I finally got around to it now.

Whenever I cast a vote, when I reload the page it doesn't count. My vote is still applied, it just doesn't affect the score. If I "unvote" it will also have no effect on the score.

Is this a bug, or is my account flagged as spam somehow?
post.title: Votes not registering: Am I bugged or shadowbanned?
